entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
